name: Yahrit!
description: Easy to learn and fast to play local competitive multiplayer for 2-4 players. Cleverly combine jumping and dashing mechanics to outwit your rivals in this sweet pixel art brawler!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Dual Core 2GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Local multiplayer only. Up to 2 players can play on the same keyboard. Gamepads are highly recommended.
